item.title: TDD talk at QEcamp23
item.description: An introductory presentation about test-driven development
item.content:encoded:
Three weeks ago, I presented at our internal Red Hat event, QEcamp. This event serves as a platform for discussing all aspects related to quality and testing. What makes it exceptional is its inclusivity â€” it brings together not just quality engineers but associates from various departments, fostering discussions around the topic of quality.

My contribution included an overview presentation on test-driven development, where I shared the basics and my experience with this alternative approach to the conventional development process. You can view the video recording here if you are interested. HTML slides are available here.
